UpdatePackageSource.Name: iu_core
UpdatePackageSource.Info: [+] Added Win7 jumplist [c] Allow editing of default thumbnail templates by making a copy [+] Copy image in data:URL format, closes [+] Added "Clear History" button [+] Added "Show screenshot folder" menu item [f] Fixed deleting of an account [+] Show file count in file list [f] Fixed creation of new folder in multithreaded mode [+] Added Signup link to login dialog; [f] Fixed album's link in results panel; [f] Show file size limits in SizeExceed dialog [f] ImageEditor: fixed crash in Blur element [f] Fixed Installer: "install ffmpeg libs" checkbox is disabled under Wine [c] ImageEditor: close window on copy to clipboard in fullscreen mode [+] Show results of last upload (tray icon menu) [c] ImageEditor: toolbars double-buffering [f] Custom output code templates (markdown), fix empty imageUrl if no direct url available [+] Copy results to the clipboard in HTML format (for WYSYWYG editors)
